data.name: t
data.signature:
type LChar.t =
 LChar.Char of bool * bool * bool * bool * bool * bool * bool * bool

data.name: zero
data.doc: Returns a character with all bits set to false (null character)
data.pattern: Creating a null/zero character, like '\0' or character code 0 in other languages

data.name: is_printable
data.doc: Tests if character [c] is printable based on its bit pattern
data.pattern: Checking if a character is displayable/printable, like isprint() or similar character classification functions
